custom_nodes.title: Audio Duration

custom_nodes.author: Jairodaniel-17
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI-translate-offline
custom_nodes.description: ComfyUI-translate-offline is a custom node for ComfyUI designed to perform offline text translations using ONNXâ€“based translation models from Hugging Face. The project enables integrating multilingual translations into ComfyUI workflows, focusing on text prompts and conditioning for CLIP models. It supports direct translation between configured language pairs as well as pivot translation via English when no direct model exists. It uses lazy model loading to optimize performance and a SQLite-based caching system to avoid repeated translations.
